Lyric:
[by:Breatherelease]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:09.05]I've been hearing symphonies
[00:12.45]Before all I heard was silence
[00:17.10]Rhapsody for you and me
[00:20.97]And every melody is timeless
[00:25.19]Life was stringing me along
[00:29.37]Then you came and you cut me loose
[00:33.37]Was solo singing on my own
[00:37.23]Now I can't find the key without you
[00:40.80]Now your song is on repeat
[00:44.17]And I'm dancin' on to your heartbeat
[00:48.40]And when you're gone, I feel incomplete
[00:52.12]So if you want the truth
[00:55.88]I just wanna be part of your symphony
[01:01.58]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
[01:05.98]Symphony
[01:09.94]Like a love song on the radio
[01:14.02]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
[01:18.03]I'm sorry if it's all too much
[01:22.37]Every day you're here, I'm healing
[01:26.57]I was runnin' out of luck
[01:30.31]I never thought I'd find this feeling
[01:34.58]'Cause I've been hearing symphonies
[01:38.50]Before all I heard was silence
[01:42.68]A rhapsody for you and me
[01:46.70]And every melody is timeless
[01:50.02]Now your song is on repeat
[01:53.76]And I'm dancin' on to your heartbeat
[01:57.84]And when you're gone, I feel incomplete
[02:01.45]So if you want the truth
[02:05.13]I just wanna be part of your symphony
[02:11.13]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
[02:15.10]Symphony
[02:19.37]Like a love song on the radio
[02:23.33]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
[02:44.42]Now your song is on repeat
[02:48.36]And I'm dancin' on to your heartbeat
[02:52.49]And when you're gone, I feel incomplete
[02:56.07]So if you want the truth
[02:59.94]I just wanna be part of your symphony
[03:05.73]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
[03:10.07]Symphony
[03:13.90]Like a love song on the radio
[03:17.73]Oh, symphony
[03:22.34]Will you hold me tight and not let go?

[03:34.41]Will you hold me tight and not let go?
